meanings.sent1: The blueheads at the party stood out with their colorful hair.
meanings.sent2: She dyed her hair blue and became known as one of the blueheads in town.
meanings.sent3: The blueheads in the school play all had matching blue wigs.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of black-haired students, the blueheads were like vibrant flowers.
meanings.sent5: The blueheads in the fashion show rocked their unique style.

meanings.definition: A type of fish with a blue head.
meanings.sent1: The aquarium had a tank full of blueheads swimming gracefully.
meanings.sent2: The blueheads in the ocean shimmered under the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The blueheads in the fish market were the most sought after.
meanings.sent4: Among all the fish, the blueheads were the most striking with their vivid colors.
meanings.sent5: The blueheads in the river added a splash of blue to the water.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals with blue-colored heads.
meanings.sent1: The blueheads in the crowd gathered to show their unity.
meanings.sent2: The blueheads in the team worked together to achieve their goal.
meanings.sent3: The blueheads in the painting looked like a sea of blueberries.
meanings.sent4: The blueheads in the parade marched proudly with their matching headgear.
meanings.sent5: The blueheads in the photo stood out against the green background.
